whoAreWeModal.text: We are a young couple (Carla & Alexis), travelling around Québec in search of original activities. Our friends regularly ask us for ideas, so we decided to develop a website to capitalize our different finds. Actï is part of the more global project h2t.club which aim to create local communities. The source code is completely opensourced on Github. For any inquiries, please send an email to contact@h2t.club

ogDescription: Actï is a blog that help you to find activities to do, for a fee or not, in all the cities of Québec. It was born from a capitalization of Carla and Alexis' adventures and contributes to the h2t project helping the development of local communities
